entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F813,1,400255}...Hoy, how far have you gone? I'm sure{F801}you've come to terms with your feelings{F801}on this by now.{F801}{F802}I'll be waiting at the Yamato Reactor.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Ashura-kai member\0{F87A,47}...Dude, what took you so long? I was{F801}gettin' lonely here. I felt real bad{F801}asking you to do this, y'know...{F801}{F802}I made sure to put Mr. Tayama's demons{F801}in the right places and set up a Domain{F801}to boot.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Ashura-kai member\0{F87A,47}Even if by some mistake those Ring of{F801}Gaea punks show up, there's no way{F801}they can get past those two demons.{F801}{F802}So... I'm gonna take off now.{F801}
